reviewText: Didnt realize it was UK compatible we have to change our computer settings to be able to play. But we love this series.
Nothing against the DVD set itself, just the person who wrote product description. Description stated all region. Its not.
the DVD player only play's disc two. disc one shows up as regional code error.
One of the best shows on survival, includes some great examples from real life situations. If you are in the USA you will need to unlock your DVD player's region codes. (Real simple google search)
